long_description: With sturdy Shimano parts and 24 gears, the Raleigh Talus 29er hardtail mountain bike offers an accessible introduction to the fast-rolling world of 29ers. Sturdy Shimano drivetrain offers responsive shifting and efficient power transfer; trigger shifters deliver snappy, precise shifts through the 24 gears. Butted aluminum frame features a formed down tube and CNC-machined, tapered head tube for improved strength. Suntour XCT 29 suspension fork offers 100mm of travel to take the harsh edges off of trail features; suspension can be locked out when not needed. Promax Decipher hydraulic disc brakes use a 180mm front rotor and 160mm rear rotor to deliver powerful braking in all conditions. Weinmann U28 rims are outfitted with the versatile Kenda Slant 6 tires for good grip, confident cornering and fast-rolling performance. Bike comes with a basic set of composite platform pedals (pedals not pictured). Specs on the Raleigh Talus 29er hardtail mountain bike are subject to change.
